body: Does anyone know if it gives compatibility guidance? Because I don't know what parts compatible T_T
body_tagged: Does anyone know if it gives compatibility guidance? Because I don't know what parts compatible T_T
title: question about pcpartpicker

replies.body: If it doesn't fit in the case, isn't compatible, etc, it will inform you that the specifications do not match.
replies.body_tagged: If it doesn't fit in the case, isn't compatible, etc, it will inform you that the specifications do not match.
